channel.title: Can anyone give me 1 reason why full Rune/F2P is fine but full Dragon/P2P isn't?
channel.description:
I see no reason why this server should be limited to F2P equips (in F2P's case, the "limit" is full rune.) Several RSC servers in the past have had full Dragon equips, which would be the "limit" in P2P RSC.
I don't see any legitimate reason why holding the game back in the proverbial "Stone Age" of RSC (Pre-dragon equips) is in any way beneficial for any group of players, be it duelers/stakers, skillers or PKers. It's not like the PKers won't be able to equip Dragon equips. If you guys enjoy 3-hitting people, you'd do that even more often with Dragon-based weaponry (obviously.)

item.title: Can anyone give me 1 reason why full Rune/F2P is fine but full Dragon/P2P isn't?
item.dc:creator: @0xCAFEBABE 0xCAFEBABE
item.description:
@0xCAFEBABE wrote:

Rodgerwilco: As far as I know, that’s the time they released that security feature. They didn’t have it when i first started playing, in december of 2001 or so. I also have quite a few accounts with recovery questions last set around then. For me it was the 28:th of february 2002, to be exact. I also have a few accounts from back in 2002 with “password last changed” set to “never”.

Read full topic

item.title: Can anyone give me 1 reason why full Rune/F2P is fine but full Dragon/P2P isn't?
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

p2p is where like… shit went down. It might be interesting to a few people here… but on February 27th 2002 when members was released they forced you to update your security questions. My security questions on my account are exactly February 27th 2002. Will provide a pic when I login.

Edit: Attached the image

Read full topic

item.title: Can anyone give me 1 reason why full Rune/F2P is fine but full Dragon/P2P isn't?
item.dc:creator: @da_real_hype da real hype
item.description:
@da_real_hype wrote:

[quote=“nacional, post:15, topic:535396”][quote author=0xCAFEBABE link=topic=654193.msg4407471#msg4407471 date=1392457127]
nacional:

I am almost sure I have seen 35s being hit in RSC.
[/quote]
You’re right. In p2p you could hit that but, p2p came later in rsc and likewise dragon items.[/quote]

later? was like 1-2 months after the wild came out… the game was free to play and that’s where people pked because they would find more people. if everyone on earth was worth a million dollars and rsc was $5 a month. everyone would have p2p and pk on p2p worlds.

Read full topic

item.title: Can anyone give me 1 reason why full Rune/F2P is fine but full Dragon/P2P isn't?
item.dc:creator: @Fabrice_L Fabrice L
item.description:
@Fabrice_L wrote:

[quote=“K!zL, post:12, topic:535396”][quote author=nacional link=topic=654193.msg4382569#msg4382569 date=1384066096]
^ who knows
But on topic. Everytime I play servers with custom items, the pure pking is always fudgeed
specially when they raise the cap level. Jagex intentionally or unintentionally made it so
the max hit is 33 and thus 3 of those would equal 99 hp for a 3 hit. Which is hard to do.
When you add custom items/raise cap you fudge that equation up, and the fights
basically boils down to whoever attacked first.
[/quote]

Pretty much this.

~K!zL[/quote]

Yes, jagex might’ve made it 33, but I’m pretty sure it would’ve stayed 33 if they implemented dragon armor, they would’ve downgraded all other items a bit.

Read full topic

item.title: Can anyone give me 1 reason why full Rune/F2P is fine but full Dragon/P2P isn't?
item.dc:creator: @nacional nacional
item.description:
@nacional wrote:

^ who knows
But on topic. Everytime I play servers with custom items, the pure pking is always fucked
specially when they raise the cap level. Jagex intentionally or unintentionally made it so
the max hit is 33 and thus 3 of those would equal 99 hp for a 3 hit. Which is hard to do.
When you add custom items/raise cap you fuck that equation up, and the fights
basically boils down to whoever attacked first.
